Title: Incipit with Illuminated Titlepeice Introducing the Fourth Book of the Collection of Poems (masnavi)
Medium: ink and pigments on buff-colored laid paper
Description: This illuminated titlepiece from Walters manuscript W.625 introduces the 4th book (daftar) of the Collection of poems (Masnavi-i ma'navi).
Keywords: Islamic; Persian; Book; Calligraphy; Codex; Colophon; Illumination; Illustration; Manuscript; New Abbasid Style; Iran; Sufism; Literature -- Poetry; Literature -- Prose
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Jalal al-Din Rumi, Maulana (Persian, 1207-1273)
